text.sentence: I am working through a few issues here and I expect to get back to you shortly.
text.signature: Thank you for your patience, Dan Diamond

text.sentence: Diamond-san, As I wrote in the past, Nissho Iwai's LNG related department has been transferred into a new joint venture company between Nissho and Sumitomo Corp. as of October 1, 2001, namely, "LNG Japan Corp.".
In this connection, we would like to conclude another NDA with LNG Japan Corp, as per attached.
Please review it and it would be great if you could make original again and send us for Mr.Miyazawa's signature.
Also, please advise us how we should treat Nissho's NDA in these circumstances.
BTW, I talked with Mr.Matsubara, Manager of Enron Global Finance in Tokyo.
We are internally discussing when we start our official meeting.
Please let us know when you are ready.
Please approve or make changes to their new NDA.
They need to change the counterparty name due to a joint venture.
I wanted to let you know this was coming in as soon as Mark approves the changes.
Dealing with Japan is somewhat time challenging.
